alert.note: Alert for Muskogee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:57AM CDT until August 07 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MCINTOSH...NORTHEASTERN OKMULGEE AND NORTHWESTERN MUSKOGEE COUNTIES... At 257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Bald Hill, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Muskogee... Checotah... Oktaha... Taft... Boynton... Council Hill... Rentiesville... Bald Hill... Wainwright... Summit... Jamesville... Eram... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 259 and 263. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
